title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 51.2 - Standards for new passenger car tires
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 51.2 - Standards for new passenger car tires

State Regulations
(a) No tire shall be manufactured in New York

State for use on 1948 or later model passenger cars unless such tire conforms
to Federal motor vehicle safety standard number 109. (b) No tire shall be distributed, offered for
sale or sold in this State for use on 1948 or later model passenger cars unless
such tire when manufactured conformed to Federal motor vehicle safety standard
number 109. (c) No person shall
sell any new passenger car tire mounted on a rim unless such rim is selected in
accordance with Federal motor vehicle safety standard number 110. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
51.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
